verses.roman:
śrī-mādhava ghoṣa--mukhya kīrtanīyā-gaṇe
nityānanda-prabhu nṛtya kare yāṅra gāne

synonyms: śrī-mādhava ghoṣa—of the name Śrī Mādhava Ghoṣa; mukhya—chief; kīrtanīyā-gaṇe—amongst the performers of saṅkīrtana; nityānanda-prabhu—of the name Nityānanda Prabhu; nṛtya—dance; kare—does; yāṅra—whose; gāne—in song.
translation: Śrī Mādhava Ghoṣa was a principal performer of kīrtana. While he sang, Nityānanda Prabhu danced.
